channel.title: Why are these boards in this section?
channel.description:
This is a serious question here. I wanted to know why these boards go in the "RuneScape 2 Server Emulation" section when we're not aloud to talk about RSPS...
Explain please?

item.title: Why are these boards in this section?
item.dc:creator: @Soul-Scape Soul-Scape
item.description:
@Soul-Scape wrote:

I think its a good idea to put it here. I’ve actually wanted a section like this for a long time. Good job staff of mopar =)

Read full topic
item.source: Why are these boards in this section?

item.title: Why are these boards in this section?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:277231"]It’s a retarded idea to even add this section, if they wanted to chat about anything besides RSPS, they should go to moparisthebest.org/smf.

It’ll probably be removed soon as it’ll probably get spammed by most of the retards here advertising/posting in wrong section.[/quote]

Its a good idea since most members on this forum are not welcomed on mitb.com becuase they start talking about severs.

Read full topic
item.source: Why are these boards in this section?

item.title: Why are these boards in this section?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:3, topic:277231”]Where do you suggest we put them?

[hr]

It’s a retarded idea to even add this section, if they wanted to chat about anything besides RSPS, they should go to moparisthebest.org/smf.

BAAAAAAAAAAAD idea for mitbers as well as mscpers.[/quote]

hi gyus i want to talk about swnie flu
dumfuck niggercoon fuck off
[quote=frank_] dumfuck niggercoon fuck off [/quote] wat that?
[quote=frank_] dumfuck niggercoon fuck off [/quote] [img]http://bs.bungie.org/owned.gif[/img]

Had to give mental picture. Ty 4 time

item.title: Why are these boards in this section?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:3, topic:277231”]Where do you suggest we put them?

[hr]

It’s a retarded idea to even add this section, if they wanted to chat about anything besides RSPS, they should go to moparisthebest.org/smf.

BAAAAAAAAAAAD idea for mitbers as well as mscpers.[/quote]Perhaps make the Vet boards private, and make the “Inside Talk” section public and place them there? (Too much work, leave them here.)

Honestly I don’t care where they go, but this was just on my mind.

Read full topic
item.source: Why are these boards in this section?

item.title: Why are these boards in this section?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Niall:

Where do you suggest we put them?

They don’t belong here but i really don’t think we need another section for just these 2 boards. Unless you made questions into an actual board. Then maybe that would work and look alright.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are these boards in this section?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Frell:

To help moparscape build a community within itself instead of trying to post on mitb and being flamed and brutally beaten.

Read full topic
